1.description: Allows him to switch the positions of anything with cursed energy within his range with a clap of his hands.

2.description: Ability to create physical objects out of nothing using cursed energy

3.description: Enables the user to transfer their brain into another body, fully taking over and using their techniques/memories.

4.description: Makes real any effects of situations the user finds funny, turning Fumihiko Takaba's jokes into actual powers based on comedic context.

5.description: Enables generation and manipulation of ice at will, creating wide-area ice attacks.

6.description: Grants eternal life by preventing the user's body from dying of old age, though the user still ages and suffers regression.

7.description: Inverts the potency of received attacks: weak strikes become strong and strong strikes become weak; used by Jiro Awasaka.

8.description: Allows the user to summon protective auspicious beasts, each granting different defensive or offensive support.

9.description: Jogo generates intense cursed flames, heat rays, or volcanic vents to unleash destructive beams.

10.description: Controls crows and other birds infused with cursed energy for reconnaissance and special attacks like Bird Strike

11.description: Enables the user to summon, control, and utilize captured cursed spirits, adjusting range per spirit; used by Suguru Geto and Kenjaku.

12.description: Remotely controls puppets/artificial bodies with cursed energy for long-range combat; exemplified by Kokichi Muta (Mechamaru) and Masamichi Yaga.

13.description: Manipulates nature to grow cursed plants like roots and seeds over a battlefield for offensive coverage; used by Hanami.

14.description: Manipulates and reshapes souls and bodies through physical contact, altering forms at will; Mahito's technique.

15.description: Mahoraga adapts to any phenomenon after exposure, becoming resistant, immune, or able to counter it.

16.description: Divides the target into a 7:3 ratio to create a critical weak point, guaranteeing a critical hit at that location; Kento Nanami's innate technique.

17.description: Releases freezing mist that forms massive ice columns, instantly immobilizing groups.

18.description: Generates and controls spiked ice shards that freeze and skewer targets, devastating multiple foes.

19.description: Summons a spiral-patterned horn that can be launched as a cursed-energy projectile which relentlessly pursues its target until it lands a hit.

20.description: Envelops the user in cursed water, cushioning impacts and enhancing mobility for evasion and repositioning.

21.description: Temporarily nullifies pain perception through intracerebral doping, greatly boosting endurance in combat but draining stamina and preventing rest afterward.

22.description: Channels cursed energy into the hands to manifest a large, dragon-like entity that charges forward to smash into opponents; it can be destroyed if damaged enough.

23.description: Amai’s technique lets him expel sugar from his body to create and project solid forms or inject it into others for healing/support.

24.description: The rotating wheel above Mahoraga symbolizes harmony and initiates its adaptation process.

25.description: Commands a cursed-infused crow to dive kamikaze-style at a target, causing a devastating explosion on impact.

26.description: Deploys corrosive blood wings for short-range flight and widespread corrosive blood attack.

27.description: Causes rapid decomposition upon contact with the user's blood, corroding tissue and weakening the victim.

28.description: Combines two or more souls into a single body to increase mass and strength; used by Mahito.

29.description: Creates a deformed mass of unstable fused souls for unpredictable offensive attacks; used by Mahito.

30.technique_name: Instant Spirit Body of Distorted Killing
30.description: Transforms the user into a pure spiritual entity with maximum power, enhancing resilience and abilities; Mahito's ultimate form.

31.description: Creates a structural weak point in the environment and causes it to collapse in a single strike, bringing down terrain or structures.

32.description: Allows the user to copy and use other sorcerers’ cursed techniques temporarily after forming a bond.

33.description: Once blood enters their target begins to poison and decompose the target's body at the point of entry.

34.description: Panda’s unique ability to switch between three 'cores' (Panda, Gorilla, Triceratops), each with distinct abilities and fighting style.

35.description: Tsukumo’s technique to manipulate mass at will, drastically increasing striking power or manipulating environments.

36.description: Allows him to create up to four perfect clones of himself.

37.description: Infuses cursed energy with electricity for high-voltage attacks, can discharge energy to cause paralysis or explosions.

38.description: Use his body as a sound amplification device, amplifying and launching waves of cursed energy.

39.description: Infuses a sword with cursed flames for enhanced cutting and burning.

40.description: Supernatural luck affecting all swordplay and survival outcomes, allows improbable escapes and lucky strikes.

41.description: Allows user to manipulate the 'surface' of the sky like a mirror for attacks, movement, and defense.

42.description: Allows user to detach and explode their own body parts as deadly bombs, with no pain.

43.description: Compresses space into a sharp plane, shattering it to bypass guards and blast opponents away with destructive concussive force.

44.description: Manipulates space at the atomic level to control distance, mass, attraction, and repulsion through sub-techniques.

45.description: Provides extreme cursed energy visualization and reduces cursed energy consumption to near zero when using Limitless.

46.description: Creates an invisible barrier of infinite space around the user, stopping any approaching object at a fraction of distance.

47.description: Generates a blue orb that converges space to create a powerful attraction field, pulling and collapsing matter.

48.description: Generates a red impulse that repels everything it touches with violent force, creating a massive shockwave.

49.description: Combines Blue and Red to create a destructive purple blast that erases matter by merging attraction and repulsion.

50.description: Imbues the user's words with cursed energy to issue irresistible commands, forcing actions like Stop or Sleep.

51.description: Manipulates and controls the user's own blood for attacks, defense, and physical enhancements.

52.description: Concentrates a large volume of blood to increase pressure and speed for a subsequent high-velocity attack.

53.description: Boosts heart rate and accelerates cursed blood circulation throughout the body, increasing strength, speed, and perception.

54.description: Evenly distributes the power boost of Flowing Red Scale body-wide for maximum strength, speed, and durability.

55.description: Unleashes sharpened blood that rapidly flies through the air and slices through.

56.description: Fires a high-pressure stream of hardened blood as a distant piercing attack that penetrates multiple targets.

57.description: Detonates multiple blood droplets around the enemy simultaneously, causing explosion-like projectile damage.

58.description: Shapes blood into a spinning serrated blade to slice through opponents in close combat.

59.description: Invokes and controls ten shadow shikigami with unique abilities, summoned sequentially from the user's shadow.

60.description: Divides a second into 24 frames, allowing the user to move at high speed and paralyze those who do not adjust.

61.description: Uses a straw doll as a conduit to curse a target remotely by inserting a personal item and cursed nails into the doll.

62.description: Creates internal cursed energy resonance in a target when cursed nails are driven into a straw doll containing the target's remains, causing internal damage.

63.description: Detonates multiple cursed nails embedded in the environment or target simultaneously, producing a cursed energy shockwave.

64.description: Hardens his blood, internally or externally, to create super-dense objects or reinforce his body, despite thrombosis risk.

65.description: Dismantle enhanced with binding vow broadening its target area to include space, existence, and the world themselves, transforming the regular slashes into 'slashes that cut the world'.

66.description: Allows him to create and manipulate flames for long-range attacks by forming them into the shape of an arrow before launching it.

67.description: Creates an esoteric barrier zone that nullifies any cursed technique entering it, offering total defense against techniques.

68.description: Generates a small personal barrier that automatically neutralizes incoming cursed techniques within a fixed radius.

69.description: Deploys a simple barrier that cancels out Domain Expansions in an immediate area.

70.description: Combines Simple Domain with rapid sword drawing (Iaido) for coordinated defense and offense.

71.description: Converts negative cursed energy into positive energy to produce healing effects and regenerate damaged tissue.

72.description: Unique high-level RCT, enabling rapid regeneration and even reviving others.

73.description: A rare congenital condition in which a sorcerer is born with either no cursed energy or drastically reduced cursed energy in exchange for superhuman physical abilities. Not a 'technique' in the classic sense but a biological binding that results in monstrous strength, agility, and durability, while being immune to certain curse-detection abilities.

74.description: It temporarily amplifies the cursed energy of any willing sorcerer within range, including herself.

75.description: Allows the user to instantly transport themselves and others to a predetermined location by physical contact.

76.description: Allows the user to manipulate gravity to nullify its effects or create repulsion fields; enables floating, flight, and defensive barriers by altering gravitational forces in a localized area.

77.description: Punching-based technique utilizing cursed energy manipulation.

78.description: Phenomenon in jujutsu that greatly amplifies the user's physical strike when cursed energy is applied to it within one-millionth of a second.

79.description: An invisible blade that can be thrown at close range or from a distance at high speed, cutting through anything. It can be used against inanimate objects, cursed spirits, and sorcerers.

80.description: A second slashing attack that adjusts its power based on the target's resistance and your cursed energy level to knock them down with a single blow. The cutting power depends on the cursed energy emitted by the user.

81.description: The user manifests their own domain to nullify the guaranteed hit of a domain. It envelops the user in cursed energy that counterattacks the moment the domain comes into contact.

82.description: Twin canine shikigami with powerful noses for tracking and lethal fangs and claws for devouring curses.

83.description: Improved version of the black Divine Dog that incorporates the power of its fallen white twin.

84.description: A winged shikigami armed with electro-shock wings that can carry people short distances.

85.description: A gigantic snake shikigami that was used to ensnare Megumi's targets.

86.description: A large toad shikigami with a long and powerful tongue that can grab people and pull them through the air.

87.description: An extension technique that combines Toad and Nue to summon numerous winged toads that support Megumi in battle.

88.description: Max Elephant has the ability to produce a massive volume of water from its trunk and its weight can be used offensively as well.

89.description: A swarm of rabbit shikigami that Megumi uses as a distraction or to help him figure out his enemies abilities.

90.technique_name: Eight Handled Sword Divergent Sila Divine General Mahoraga
90.description: The most powerful uncontrollable shikigami that the Ten Shadows Technique can produce.

91.description: It can perform reverse cursed technique and output the positive energy to heal others or neutralize cursed energy.

92.description: It deals damage by charging and ramming into enemies. While it can only move in a straight line.

93.description: A shikigami that Sukuna dominated after possessing Megumi. Its appearance and abilities are unknown.

94.description: A fusion shikigami that combines Nue with Great Serpent, Round Deer, and Tiger Funeral. Can produce electricity from its fists and regenerate itself or heal others with reverse cursed technique.

95.description: Allows him to unleash invisible slashes, either at range or through physical contact, to cut down his enemies.

96.description: The user touches their target to create cutting lines along the surface and unleashes a powerful slash that follows along the pattern to cut down everything in range in one fell swoop.

97.description: The cursed spirit of Rika Orimoto. She serves as the external storage for Yuta's copied cursed techniques and cursed tools.

98.description: Nullifies or negates all jujutsu, barriers, seals; no exceptions.

99.description: Casts a pillar of light onto a target, extinguishing any cursed techniques under the light.

100.description: It grants him the ability to conjure a pen-like cursed tool capable of creating panels that allow him to peer into his target's future.

101.description: Pachinko-themed cursed technique that, via Domain Expansion, manifests the Private Pure Love Train game and its effects.

102.description: A fast sword drawing technique that coats Kusakabe's blade in cursed energy and rotates it around the blade to increase its drawing speed dramatically.

103.description: A thick single-edged cursed blade with engine vents that stores and ejects kinetic and cursed energy, massively boosting its cutting power.

104.description: A New Shadow Style technique that recreates part of a broken blade with cursed energy.

105.description: Barriers are used to conceal, contain, or deny entry to others within that space.

106.description: Create a barrier that surrounds a certain area to protect civilians from battlefield.

107.description: The maximum technique of Cursed Spirit Manipulation combines a massive number of collected curses into one powerful attack.

108.description: Garuda gains virtual mass from Star Rage, becoming Yuki's cursed tool and fighting alongside her.

109.description: Cursed technique that marks targets with five 'stars' patterned after the Southern Cross, requiring approach in a set order or causing mutual attraction.

110.description: A technique where Mahito amplifies a soul’s energy using Soul Multiplicity, then channels the immense output directly at the opponent for a powerful attack.

111.description: Summons flying curse insects from his head that sting and detonate into fiery explosions.

112.description: Hurls a massive flaming meteor capable of devastating wide areas on impact.

113.description: Generates and manipulates massive waves of water purely from cursed energy.

114.description: Summons an endless swarm of shikigami.

115.description: Change building layouts daily to hide school locations; concealment-focused, not strong against infiltration.

116.description: Thousands of shifting doors hide the Tombs entrance, cursed warehouse, and Tengen’s shrine; invite-only access.

117.description: Vacant barriers outlined by hexagonal shells, placed above the Tombs of the Star.

118.description: Superior barriers that enhance cursed spirit suppression and precision; guard key jujutsu sites.

119.description: Telekinetically controls a broomstick for levitation or generating cursed-energy wind gusts.

120.description: Uses broom-ground friction to fire a fast, crescent-shaped cursed-energy wind blade with cutting power.

121.description: Kokichi’s mechanical cursed corpse used for combat, missions, and large-scale puppet piloting.

122.description: Extends forearm blades and spikes for close-range attacks.

124.description: Blocks incoming attacks with fortified forearm.

125.description: Uses elbow-released cursed energy to boost attack speed.

126.description: Fires cursed energy blast from palm.

127.description: Adds mouth cannon for combined high-power blasts.

128.description: Large puppet capable of massive attacks with stored cursed energy.

129.description: Fires dual-hand blasts consuming two years’ stored cursed energy.

130.description: Five tracking cursed-energy blasts consuming five years’ stored energy.

131.description: Small posthumous communication puppets powered by Kokichi’s remaining cursed energy.

132.description: Stops existing wounds from worsening by halting bleeding and reducing pain, but can’t heal or prevent new injuries.

133.description: Enhances himself and weakens foes by dancing to a personal rhythm that expels curses without using a domain.

134.description: Uses a voodoo doll and noose to fatally hang targets or strike vital points, reflecting damage from the doll onto them.

135.description: Allows her to manipulate and reposition any photographed subject, including herself, though it quickly exhausts her.

136.description: Transforms cursed energy into electricity by reconstructing his flesh, granting immense power but usable only once before his body collapses.

137.description: A Lady-Justice-like figure that delivers 'blind justice' by weighing judgment over its targets.

138.description: Changes her hair into the shape of a jet plane with fiery boosters strong enough to propel her through the air at high speed.

139.description: Change his hair into a propeller with four blades and can fly around or suspend himself in the air.

140.description: Constructs insect-like wings for high-speed flight.

141.description: Semi-autonomous cursed metal shaped into versatile weapons.

142.description: Liquid metal carapace enhancing all physical stats and mid-range control.

143.description: Perfect sphere of infinite pressure that becomes unavoidable in her domain.

144.description: Burns a written contract to instantly recreate the described object or service with temporary, commandable effects.

145.description: Manipulates her scorpion tail-like hair to strike foes, causing only mild irritation.

146.description: Summons grotesque rodent-like shikigami whose orbital tracks around him form an inviolable barrier, making close approach nearly impossible.

147.description: Can fire concentrated blasts of cursed energy from his cannon-shaped pompadour, maintaining full power even without his technique activated.

148.description: Unleash a hyper-focused beam of cursed energy with enough destructive force to level multiple city blocks.

149.description: Conjure giant fists propelled by cursed energy like missiles.

150.description: Envelops anyone he gazes upon in an immobilizing aura.

151.description: Chojuro can shape terrain into giant stone constructs for mid-range restraint and offense.

152.description: Morphs fingers into dark claws for close-range slashing attacks, though effectiveness is unclear.

153.description: Creates a giant virtual hand that grabs, throws, or crushes targets from afar.

154.description: Forces a previously 'Heart Caught' target to fixate on Larue, distracting them with heart-shaped pupils.

155.description: Can summon the body or soul information from a deceased person using their corpse. This allows her to shape-shift herself or a willing participant into that person.

156.description: Ganesha’s technique removes 'obstacles' by binding and displacing the conceptual target of its ability.

157.description: Traps the target in a coffin, crushes it with a gravestone, then triggers a lethal countdown.

158.description: Kurourushi commands swarms of man-eating cockroaches reinforced with cursed energy, capable of stripping flesh in seconds.

159.description: Devoured flesh triggers self-reproduction, allowing Kurourushi to spawn offspring and transfer its cursed energy upon death.

160.description: Summons flying insect curses carrying liquid sacs that burst to impair targets’ vision.

161.description: A jellyfish-like shikigami that paralyzes with cursed energy poison from its tendrils, leaving burning black marks, and can also pierce flesh with spiked stingers.

162.description: Superior arms, jaws, and senses; adapts insect traits for combat.

163.description: Super jumps and powerful bites, strong enough to cut metal.

164.description: Spits cursed mucus that spreads and corrodes like a plague.

165.description: Extends abdomen tip up to 3× length to stab enemies.

166.description: The impact of the hit sends a shockwave through the user's guard, so they feel the damage even if they defend.

167.description: Panda can transform into a muscular gorilla, is much stronger and faster in this form but at the cost of rapidly draining his cursed energy.

168.description: Panda can transform into a bipedal Triceratops, but this form's abilities have not been displayed and its capabilities are unknown

169.description: Through a binding vote, Aoi changed the condition for activating Boogie Woogie after losing a hand, improving its technique to 50 exchanges per second and increasing its range and targets.
